Prizes.Name: More, Coming Soon... Awaiting Microsoft DK :)

Sessions.Title: Velkommen til Azure Global Bootcamp, frokost og registrering

Speaker.Name: Peter Selch Dahl, MVP
Speaker.Description: Peter is a Azure Microsoft Valuable Professional (MVP) and a Microsoft P-Seller. He works as a Senior Cloud Architect with a wide variety of experience in working with Microsoft Cloud and infrastructure. He is particularly interested in the fields related to core infrastructure such as security, virtualization, automation and management. These days he primarily work with the area's related to Microsoft Azure, Office 365 and Microsoft Intune but still with a twist of passion for network security & remote access technologies

Sessions.Title: Azure Service Fabric by Sekoia - Mentioned during BUILD Keynote,  Downstairs canteen

Speaker.Name: Claus Nielsen
Speaker.Description: Claus Nielsen er CTO for Sekoia (http://sekoia.dk). Sekoia er en point of care løsning baseret på Microsoft Azure til plejecentre, specialinstitutioner og bosteder. Med flere end 30 applikationer understøtter vi personalets faglige behov og hjælper dem med at smidiggøre deres arbejdsgange.

Sessions.Title: Continuous Delivery with Docker on Azure - Ninja Docker and Jenkins Stuff by Johan - Whale Power,  Downstairs canteen

Speaker.Name: Johan Sigfred Abildskov
Speaker.Description: Johan is a Continous Delivery expert at Praqma. He helps companies build better software every day. Johan is a big fan of automation and the benefits that it brings to software teams, small or large. Johan enjoys bringing teams together for a greater good with the help of awesome tools.

Sessions.Title: Afternoon Coffee Break - Thanks to Klestrup Partners for bringing the cake
Monitor application usage and performance using the Azure Application Insights,  Downstairs canteen

Speaker.Name: Anders Rask
Speaker.Description: SharePoint Solution Architect & Developer working at ProActive A/S. He specialize in SharePoint and SharePoint Online development/architecture. He worked with SharePoint since SPS 2001/Tahoe. He also have experience working with Azure IaaS and PaaS solutions.

Speaker.Name: Mads Damgård
Speaker.Description: Mads is a Cloud Solution Architect in Microsoft working with customers and partners to maximize the business opportunities of Cloud computing as well as building up Cloud knowledge on the Microsoft Azure platform. He has been with Microsoft Denmark for more than 10 years

Sessions.Title: Windows 10 and Azure AD, Ground floor canteen

Speaker.Name: Jesper Nielsen
Speaker.Description: Jesper is a Solution Architect & Technology Evangelist working for ATEA Denmark. He is the founder of Everything Windows User Group (http://ewug.dk)

Sessions.Title: Microsoft Azure AD and EMS,  Ground floor canteen

Speaker.Name: Per Larsen
Speaker.Description: Per is a Solution Architect at Atea Denmark A/S. He is a EMS Ninja that loves working with Intune and deployment. Find his blog here: https://osddeployment.wordpress.com. Per have worked with Deployment of OS and Application since 1998. Per works with Microsoft technologies: Intune, EMS, Azure AD, SCCM, MDT, RDS, Windows Client, Enterprise Client Management, GPO, MDOP.

Sessions.Title: Deploying IaaS with Azure Resource Manager,  Ground floor canteen

Speaker.Name: Peter Selch Dahl, MVP
Speaker.Description: Peter is a Azure Microsoft Valuable Professional (MVP) and a Microsoft P-Seller. He works as a Senior Cloud Architect with a wide variety of experience in working with Microsoft Cloud and infrastructure. He is particularly interested in the fields related to core infrastructure such as security, virtualization, automation and management. These days he primarily work with the area's related to Microsoft Azure, Office 365 and Microsoft Intune but still with a twist of passion for network security & remote access technologies

Sessions.Title: Cool stuff with Microsoft RDS 2016 and GPU + Azure RemoteApp,  Ground floor canteen

Speaker.Name: Thomas Poppelgaard, MVP
Speaker.Description: Thosmas is a Microsoft MVP in RDS. He is his own boss at his own company, where he have clients globally and his company goal is to better help business adapt new technologies. He is a Technology Evangelist, and a subject matter expert on remote graphics, where he help companies globally how they can virtualize 2D/3D graphics in the cloud. His clients are both Vendors, ISV, ISP, Distributors, Resellers and End customers.

Sessions.Title: Afslutning af Bootcamp (Closing), Ground floor canteen
